\begin{question}
Explain the effect of the second declaration in each one of
the following sets of declarations. Indicate which, if any, are illegal.
\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]
^^I\item
\begin{lstlisting}
int calc(int, int);
int calc(const int, const int);
\end{lstlisting}

^^I\item
\begin{lstlisting}
int get();
double get();
\end{lstlisting}

^^I\item
\begin{lstlisting}
int *reset(int *);
double *reset(double *);
\end{lstlisting}
\end{enumerate}
\end{question}
